name: Deity Driving
description:
DEITY DRIVING mushes adventure and arcade elements – drive around as a submissive car, bump into strangers and enjoy your involuntary vacation!



There are three different paths and endings, seeing them all takes about 20 to 30 minutes.



Features:

  • Fully voiced
  • A relaxed ride with dogs and demons
  • 2.5D movement
  • Realistic sock physics
  • Approved by the Quirk Police ("Not too quirky, B-")
